title: Serif font
author: VITAMINADO

comments.content:
"Fruta Selectionada" must be **[Wilke](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317125352/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Linotype%20%2F%20%28Commercial%29&ffam=Wilke%20LT%2055%20-%20Roman&fid=03561ba0d87d070df320f63158c81e73&fsize=60&text=Fruta%20Selectionada&fit=1)** by Martin Wilke [1988] available from Adobe, Linotype  
"Frutas Bela" looks like an emboldened **[Gabriola](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317125352/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=MS-Windows-Fonts%20%2F%20%28Commercial%29&ffam=Gabriola%20-%20Regular&fid=b26b20369adfef2b3d65d266e0625fe2&fstyle=b&fsize=60&text=Frutas%20Bela&fit=1)** an MS-Windows font
